statements: SELECT * FROM inventory_tracking ORDER BY product_id ASC;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM inventory_tracking WHERE current_stock < min_stock_threshold;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM inventory_tracking WHERE current_stock < 10;
SELECT * FROM inventory_tracking WHERE product_name LIKE 'P%';
SELECT product_name, min_stock_threshold FROM inventory_tracking WHERE min_stock_threshold > current_stock ORDER BY min_stock_threshold DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_tracking WHERE current_stock > min_stock_threshold
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM inventory_tracking ORDER BY current_stock DESC
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM inventory_tracking WHERE product_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT * FROM inventory_tracking WHERE current_stock < 100 AND min_stock_threshold > 50
SELECT product_id, product_name, current_stock, min_stock_threshold FROM inventory_tracking
SELECT * FROM inventory
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM inventory ORDER BY product_id DESC
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT order_id, product_id, quantity_ordered, order_date FROM orders ORDER BY order_date ASC
SELECT * FROM inventory
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE price > 50
SELECT order_id, product_id, order_date FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC
SELECT product_name, quantity, price FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 5 AND price < 100
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE quantity_ordered BETWEEN 10 AND 20
SELECT * FROM Inventory;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE price > 100;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Inventory ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT order_id, total_price FROM Orders JOIN PaymentTransactions ON Orders.order_id = PaymentTransactions.order_id WHERE PaymentTransactions.payment_method = 'Credit Card';
SELECT * FROM Inventory;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE price > 100;
SELECT order_id, total_price, order_date FROM Orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, payment_method, payment_amount FROM PaymentTransactions WHERE payment_amount >= 50 ORDER BY transaction_date;
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity, price FROM Inventory WHERE quantity < 10;
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE quantity_sold > 10;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE contact_number LIKE '+1%';
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount FROM payments WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY product_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, price FROM inventory WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY customer_name;
SELECT product_name, quantity, price FROM inventory JOIN transactions ON inventory.product_id = transactions.product_id ORDER BY quantity * price DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT transaction_id, SUM(quantity_sold) AS total_quantity_sold FROM transactions GROUP BY transaction_id HAVING total_quantity_sold > 50 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM Inventory ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '123%';
SELECT * FROM Transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_address = '123 Main Street';
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY unit_price DESC;

SELECT Customers.customer_name, Orders.order_date, Transactions.amount FROM Customers JOIN Orders ON Customers.customer_id = Orders.customer_id JOIN Transactions ON Orders.order_id = Transactions.order_id WHERE Customers.customer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY Transactions.amount ASC;

SELECT supplier_name, COUNT(*) AS total_orders FROM Suppliers JOIN Inventory ON Suppliers.supplier_id = Inventory.product_id JOIN Orders ON Inventory.product_id = Orders.customer_id GROUP BY supplier_name ORDER BY total_orders DESC;
SELECT AVG(unit_price) AS avg_price_per_unit, MAX(quantity) AS max_quantity FROM Inventory WHERE unit_price < 50;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM Orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28');
